summary: When a leak of information in the African section of British Intelligence is discovered, security man Daintry is brought in to investigate.
cast: Richard Attenborough|Joop Doderer|John Gielgud|Derek Jacobi|Robert Morley|Ann Todd|Richard Vernon|Nicol Williamson|Iman|Keith Marsh|Anthony Woodruff|Gary Forbes|Angela Thorne|Tony Haygarth|Paul Curran|Cyd Hayman|Ken Jones|Paul Seed|Chantal Gray|Fiona Fullerton|Morris Perry|Walter Hinds|Philip Chege|Tony Vogel|Norbert Okare|Vicky Udall|Brian Epson|Mike Andrews|Leon Greene|Martin Benson|Giles Watling|Marianne Stone|Edward Dentith|Adrienne Corri|Robert Dorning|Patrick O'Connell|Sean Caffrey|Clifford Earl|Tom Chatto|Raewyn Blade|Glenna Forster-Jones|Sylvia Coleridge|Boris Isarov|Denys Hawthorne|Frank Williams|Ipi Tombi Company|Rebel|Jill Goldston|Lew Hooper|John Tatham
title: El factor humano
